attributes.action: raise the legal age to buy cans of aerosole paints from all shops to 18
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: are you fed up with seeing graffiti everywhere ??? where ever you go you see walls, fences, windows, etc etc covered in grafitti, i believe that if the age to buy cans of spray paint was to be raised to 18 then it will stop young people being able to get hold of the paint so easy.if people who are under 18 do need paint for a genuine reason then they can get an adult to get it for them. if you agree with me then please sign up
